content: That's a great approach! I'll definitely try to mix and match different hashtags to attract a wider audience. I've been paying attention to the timing of my posts and when I use certain hashtags. I realized that when I post during peak hours (between 12 pm and 3 pm) and use hashtags like #lunchbreak or #foodstagram, I get more engagement compared to posting during off-peak hours. Do you think I should stick to these peak hours or experiment with other times to reach a different audience?
